tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I was having severe tooth infection with swelling and immediately checked online for the nearest dentist and then I came across Dr Beena Gopi  , I immediately booked an appointment and went to meet her with the intention of extracting my tooth coz I could not handle it anymore ,  Dr Beena had explained to me the importance of saving my tooth so I opted for the Root Canal treatment , I am super impressed that it did not pain at all while or after the treatment , I had my crown been fixed few days back and I‚Äôm perfectly back to normal , her fees are very reasonable , highly recommend Dr Beena Gopi to all you guys . 

A big thank u to Sangeeta too who is doctors assistant .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was kind hearted, polite and very knowledgeable. She explained the cause of my problem and how it could be resolved. It was very well explained. The whole treatment procedure was done very gently and it wasn't tough for me to go through it. At the end she explained how the problem recurrence can be prevented with some easy steps. At the time of this pandemic we are going through, doc took all necessary steps to take care of patients safety. In end I would say that I was very satisfied with care and treatment I recieved. Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor was very patient and explained the procedure and also checked if I have any other problem in my mouth and also explained the root canal treatment step by step. I am very satisfied with my treatment. I did not feel any pain and I am very happy with how my cap looks ..fits just perfect and looks very natural..I highly recommend this place for any dental treatment. I know I am going to ask my friends to go here as I am confident their treatment would be satisfactory just like mine. Thank you for fixing my teeth Dr.Beena GopiüòÅüòÅüòÅ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I was in so much pain before I visited Alisa Dental Care. During the consultation, Dr Beena explained me the root cause and the treatment to be under taken, which gave me the battle to fight against my fear of dentists. She was kind enough to fit me in between her busy schedule. I had to undergo a RCT and couple of fillings, which I thought the price would be out of my budget, but it was very affordable and at the same time she made sure I dont go through a lot of pain during the treatment. She knows her work and explains it very well. l. I would highly recommend anyone for dental care.
Thanks once again Dr Beena.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Dr Beena truly cares for her patients and understands the best treatment procedure to save time and effort down the line

review: During went in for my dental fillings. I had been told that I might have to undergo a root canal and the that the teeth couldn't be saved. But when I went to Dr Beena it turned out that there was still hope. She was extremely pleasant to talk to and very reassuring. I loved the way she explained the circumstances and the intended outcomes of the procedure. All went well. Its been two years and all is well with that tooth. She has now become my family dentist and we only go to her.
